EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Tanzania update
EmailTemplate.subject: Tanzania Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Year 10 & 11 Parents,
For those of you whose child(ren) left on the residential trip yesterday, just a quick note to say that all is well and everyone has arrived safely in Tanzania.
There is no phone reception at the moment, they will have to wait 72 hours until they can connect with a local SIM.
More news to come soon.
Have a great weekend.
Best regards,
Admissions Department
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
